Text: Tuition Reimbursementpst We want to update you on a development related to tuition reimbursement As we look for ways to operate more efficiently through restructuring the company has decided to immediately suspend tuition reimbursement If you have received approval for tuition reimbursement for Spring or Summer coursework the company will honor those commitments Any costs incurred for future courses will not be reimbursed If you have questions about this change please contact your Human Resource representative
